props.name: blur
props.desc: blur value, in percentage of image dimensions. specific to keep the image blur constant at different resolutions range between 0 and 1.

props.name: applyTo
props.desc: Apply this filter to the input image data provided.  Determines whether to use WebGL or Canvas2D based on the options.webgl flag.

props.name: chooseRightDelta
props.desc: choose right value of image percentage to blur with

props.name: createHelpLayer
props.desc: If needed by a 2d filter, this functions can create an helper canvas to be used remember that options.targetCanvas is available for use till end of chain.

props.name: getAttributeLocations
props.desc: Return a map of attribute names to WebGLAttributeLocation objects.

props.name: getUniformLocations
props.desc: Return WebGL uniform locations for this filter's shader.

props.name: isNeutralState
props.desc: Generic isNeutral implementation for one parameter based filters. Used only in image applyFilters to discard filters that will not have an effect on the image Other filters may need their own version ( ColorMatrix, HueRotation, gamma, ComposedFilter )

props.name: sendAttributeData
props.desc: Send attribute data from this filter to its shader program on the GPU.

props.name: sendUniformData
props.desc: Send data from this filter to its shader program's uniforms.

props.name: toJSON
props.desc: Returns a JSON representation of an instance

props.name: toObject
props.desc: Returns object representation of an instance
